reviews.text: So good ! The tamarind and mint chutneys that came with the appetizer were delicious  full of flavor. Our garlic naan was not  greasy and was perfectly balanced as to not overpower our food. Carrie had the chicken vindaloo which Carrie will gladly eat again. Carrie's boyfriend had the chicken saag also delicious  smooth and creamy. The service was great too. Carrie sat next to what seemed like a difficult table and the server owner handled them with such grace offering suggestions and detailed explanations. the server owner even looked at another restaurant  menu that the customer pulled up to show Carrie what would be similar on the customer's menu. the server owner was very friendly to us as well. Carrie wish them much success and will definitely be back.
reviews.name: Carrie

reviews.text: The servers were very friendly and attentive. The food was very good. Jersey would recommend the vegetable biryani and chicken curry. Also had lamb masala which was very tasty. Chicken curry medium spice and had just the right bite. Jersey tried New India Gate based on the other recommendations. Prices were about normal. Only annoying thing was the alarm on the front door which every time some opened the front door  the alarm on the front door would announce front door open. Just annoying when you are having a conversation. Otherwise very good.
reviews.name: Jersey

reviews.text: Excellent food and excellent service. Very charming and attentive staff. Will definitely be back !
reviews.name: Tim

reviews.text: Favorite Indian in the area. Been several times  always a fantastic meal. Service and food are amazing !
reviews.name: Holly

reviews.text: New India Gate is amazing ! Where do Mercedes begin The decor is simple but very clean and as soon as Mercedes walked in Mercedes were greeted and seated. Mercedes encountered three waiters and every single one was super nice and three waiters answered any questions Mercedes had. This was Mercedes's first time eating Indian food and Mercedes am a fan. Mercedes's husband had the chicken masala spice level   and Mercedes had a shrimp dish  Mercedes can not  remember the exact name  spice level  . Mercedes each ordered a side of basmati rice and garlic naan. Everything was absolutley delicious and not too spicy. Mercedes ended the meal with the deep fried cheese dessert which was amazing. When you come across a place like New India Gate you want to tell everyone ! There is a shortage of places to eat where not only is the service excellent  but the food is as well. They do not  get all of these amazing ratings for nothing so go check them out ! Mercedes can not  wait to go back !
reviews.name: Mercedes

reviews.text: Best Indian food Wendy have  had in AZ. Really good. Super friendly staff  family own and run. Highly recommend.
reviews.name: Wendy

reviews.text: New India Gate is so good and reasonably priced. The service is excellent and food delish !
reviews.name: Katie

reviews.text: First time having Indian food in the Valley. Staff is friendly and attentive. Food quality was fresh and delicious. One the owners took time to make sure everything was satisfactory for our visit. Definately a place to try. Terri will be back. Our taste buds are very happy.
reviews.name: Terri

reviews.text: The food was okaish in the bufet. Some things were good but definitely not worth a   star experience. Mango Lassi n curry was good. Deserts kinda disappointed Saransh ! Pakoras n chutney was great ! Food was worth the price  just made it in !
reviews.name: Saransh

reviews.text: Anthony really like New India Gate  ! The food is always good and the staff is awesome ! You can not  beat the lunch buffet and Anthony can walk there. Anytime Anthony m craving Indian food Anthony go here to get Anthony's fix !
reviews.name: Anthony

reviews.text: New India Gate has excellent ownership ! They spend time talking to you as a customer. The food for a buffet rocks. Yummy ! Try the goat. The sauces are delicious. Desserts bliss. Not overpriced. Great food !  !
reviews.name: Michael

reviews.text: My husband and Husna found New India Gate on Yelp while visiting AZ. The service here was AMAZING. Husna have never seen such wonderful service at any other Indian restaurant. Both of the brothers went out of Both of the brothers's way to make sure My husband and Husna's drinks were refilled and food was good. on service.
reviews.name: Husna

reviews.text: New India Gate was our first Indian restaurant  and our waiter was very patient while Barb were asking about which foods our waiter recommended. The food was great  and the service was excellent. Barb highly recommend New India Gate to anyone looking for a great meal.
reviews.name: Barb

reviews.text: The food was absolutely delicious  and the service was the friendliest Mark have  seen in a long time. Mark will  definitely be going back for more !
reviews.name: Mark

reviews.text: New India Gate was SOOOOO GOOD. Nuff said !
reviews.name: Kristin

restaurants.name: Shalimar Foods
restaurants.category: Restaurants, Ethnic Food, Food, Indian, Specialty Food

reviews.text: Shalimar Foods  Sheek highly recommend the the burrito -  style chicken in naan meal. Actually   meal  is an understatement. Sheek would  be surprised if most anyone could finish the the burrito -  style chicken in naan meal on their own. Better to share the the burrito -  style chicken in naan meal. The biriyanis are quite plentiful and tasty as well. Thumbs up for the mango lassi ! There is not too much sitting room or an available restroom  so be prepared for some fabulous food and a hand wash at the end. If you are a fan of Indian food you MUST try Shalimar Foods. Sheek m betting you will  keep going back. The owner is very friendly and humble and will give you proper recommendations for your palate.
reviews.name: Sheek

reviews.text: If you are in a mood for some real good and fresh sub continental food Shalimar Foods is the place to be. Not a place known for its ambience. Shalimar Foods has just four booths but dont be mistaken with the looks of Shalimar Foods. The owner is a really nice person who has a passion of cooking and making sure The owner's customers leave happy. The food is prepared fresh and The food will surely satisfy both your taste buds and hunger pangs.
reviews.name: Karthik

reviews.text: A guy who boasted so much in a local community news edition  served chicken nuggets when asked for chicken pakora and added little bit of spices to chicken pakora. Babjee wondered when chicken pakora become a chicken nugget and become a part of Indian cuisine. The food is only so so  even though liked customer service  Shalimar Foods should correct these blunders. Babjee expect Shalimar Foods to say Babjee do not  have chicken pakora at this time rather than selling an indian chicken Nugget.
reviews.name: Babjee

reviews.text: Shalimar Foods is a great little restaurant and the prices are very reasonable. Mary have gotten addicted and seem to end up here about once a week. Shalimar Foods is a little hard to find since Shalimar Foods does not  have a big sign  but just look for the thai place next door. The food is awesome. every time Mary go Mary try something different. Mary have not  gone wrong yet. Try the shashi paneer and the aloo gobi. the shashi paneer and the aloo gobi are both the best Mary have had. The breads are also great. Service is very courteous and everything is cooked to order. On the downside the menu is limited and the menu is a true hole in the wall. Everything is very clean but it is the opposite of fancy. Food is served in to go containers with plastic utensils. If you are picky about ambiance  get it to go.
reviews.name: Mary

reviews.text: It is important to realize that different restaurants are meant for different occasions. Also  J look for value for money where value can be in the form of a delicious meal  ambiance  or personal service. J go to Shalimar Foods for a hearty meal and personal service. Indian food can be from different regions and therefore can contain different ingredients  heat levels  and flavors. Shalimar Foods primarily serves north Indian food with tastes that can only be found in roadside restaurants in India. Food is  in other words  on the spicier and slightly greasier than what one would typically find in the Valley. The owner can customize heat levels though. J have tried different dishes but one of J's favorites remains Chicken Curry. Unlike many other places  meat is tender  flavorful  and often oven baked. Curry does not contain cream which is a big plus in J's book. Chicken Tandoori oven - baked chicken  is J's another favorite. Chicken is moist and  unlike many other places  not rubbery. Everything is made to order so be prepared to wait. A typical Yelp snob like J would typically take off one star for lack of distinct and pleasant ambiance but then Shalimar Foods is not the place to go with your date or a romantic evening. Shalimar Foods is the place where you can go with alone or with a group of friends and have a delicious meal.
reviews.name: J

reviews.text: TL;DR : Great food  great value  but the interior is nothing fancy. Came by for lunch right after Shalimar Foods opened and The owner cooked everything from scratch for us and you could tell how fresh it was. Food  -  Delicious. Got chicken biryani    . on promotion ! ! and Eric's girlfriend got chicken tandoori. Both delicious  fresh  and full of flavor. The garlic naan was very fresh and some of the best Eric have  had. Value  -  Amazing deal. Two drinks and both large and filling entrees for only    . with tax. The owner gave us The garlic naan for free because Eric had a bit of a long wait and because it was our first time. Was not  really sure if Eric was supposed to tip and The owner did not  mention it so Eric forgot but next time Eric definitely will to make up for it. And because the food was so good. Atmosphere Appearance  - so this is why Eric took a star off. Eric loved Shalimar Foods because Shalimar Foods was so authentic but Shalimar Foods is quite small with   small booths likely from another restaurant. Very basic and sort of the definition of a hole in the wall. But Eric like places like Shalimar Foods because the food is usually very delicious and authentic  the food was . Just do not  expect anything fancy and you will  love it ! The owner is very friendly too if not slightly hard to understand. Summary :  if all you want is good Indian food at a good price Shalimar Foods is the place to go. Just expect the bare minimum in amenities and potentially a long wait if it is busy because Eric think The owner does nearly everything The owner right now.
reviews.name: Eric

reviews.text: Abraham have been living in Scottsdale for over   years  and its towards the end of Abraham's second year Abraham found Shalimar Foods out. Shalimar Foods's by far the best Indian restaurant Abraham have been to. Abraham am a true foodie and by nature of Abraham's lifestyle Abraham eat out everyday. Abraham have tried a couple of Indian joints  and Shalimar Foods is the best by far. Do not  go by the ambiance that is  why Shalimar Foods loses one star. Best service you can expect. The owner cooks the food The owner and luckily The owner invited Abraham into The owner's kitchen to look around  food is hygienic and well prepared and The owner made Abraham's order fresh from scratch. The owner does custom preparations and the delicacy is more north Indian. Abraham am from Delhi  India and the palate is very much homely Delhi  India cuisine. Abraham would suggest ordering a to - go  as you wo not  find the seating comfortable enough for a fine lunch or dinner.
reviews.name: Abraham

reviews.text: Do not  be put off by the look of Shalimar Foods  Shalimar Foods is  very basic. Expect paper plates and plastic cutlery but the food is great and cooked fresh by the owner. Richard went there for lunch and the owner was very welcoming and even invited us into the kitchen to watch the owner cook. Ingredients were very fresh and flavor was very authentic. Naan was outstanding. If you are  looking for good indian food Shalimar Foods is a good experience if you want something different than standard curry houses.
reviews.name: Richard

reviews.text: Not bad. Great customer service. The goat curry was delicious. Phil can see myself coming back for more ! Reasonable prices too.
reviews.name: Phil

reviews.text: Shalimar Foods is not  really  a sit down restaurant. You can but Shalimar Foods's not really designed for a sit down restaurant. You are  best off doing take out. That being said  for the most part everything is cooked to order by the one guy that owns works there. Sooooo...its going take a few minutes. Not forever but J would  plan    minutes from order to walking out the door with food. As for the food the food was all reasonably priced and of pretty good quality. All in all a good place. Not a   but not a  . Score it  .
reviews.name: J

reviews.text: Tried Shalimar Foods for the first time last night due to positive reviews on Yelp. Chuck were not  disappointed. Chuck ordered chicken tikka masala and chicken tikka. Chuck are those rare people who actually do not  like spicy food but love Indian as long as Indian is  cooked VERY Mild. So Chuck always order super  super mild. It had no heat at all so Chuck nailed it on the first attempt  which almost never happens for Chuck. The flavor was AMAZING. The sauce had an incredibly fresh taste brimming with intense flavors and fresh herbs  so much so Chuck could not  get enough. The sauce not exactly the taste Chuck remember from Chuck's days in California but unlike other Indian restaurants that fall short at imitating the taste Shalimar Foods was just so amazingly unique in taste that Chuck would  put Shalimar Foods on par with the best Chuck have  had  just uniquely different. Since Chuck's favorite Indian place in AZ closed  India  Grill Chuck have  been disappointed over and over trying to find another place. Shalimar Foods will be Chuck's new favorite. Just be aware Shalimar Foods is  really only good for takeout. As others noted  Shalimar Foods is  so tiny and not really outfitted for dine in. Also  Shalimar Foods is  really hard to find because Shalimar Foods is  so tiny. The storefront is only about    feet wide and Shalimar Foods is  tucked between a Chinese restaurant and a nail salon. Chuck drove by twice and did not  spot Shalimar Foods; the owner had to talk Chuck to Shalimar Foods ! And as other  have noted  it is  truly the owner and one other person cooking everything from scratch so it takes longer  over    minutes from the time Chuck ordered . But there is  something really quaint about the whole experience; it is  like you are  visiting the owner and one other person's home and the owner and one other person are  whipping up some home cooking back in the kitchen. Oh  and as noted  prices are very good. Generally about     less than Chuck m accustomed to paying.
reviews.name: Chuck

reviews.text: The food was just wow.. Venkatesh took party order for a friend and The food was fabulous. Everyone loved The food. Of course  the owner is a gentleman and makes sure you are welcomed. If Venkatesh am throwing a party  Venkatesh will be getting food from Shalimar. Cant wait to go there again.
reviews.name: Venkatesh

reviews.text: Sadia dined here for a birthday. A group of    size of Usmania Grill is medium   Sadia were seated in the middle of the dining space. st impressions were optimistic but by end of the night Sadia knew Sadia would not  be returning. Food quality was alright not the worst or the best Sadia have  had. What essentially turned my experience down was service   cleanliness. There were not  enough plates glasses cutlery until Sadia asked  -  it was not  too busy either. Had to ask for knives Sadia's knife was dirty Sadia could tell someone probably wiped my knife because Sadia could see small old food residue in the dry wipe marks. This turned me off immediately but still Sadia remained hopeful that everything else would go well. Remainder of the night  Sadia's polite uncle who took charge dealing with the waiters  had to get up even help my polite uncle who took charge dealing with the waiters to things that should have  been brought over by waiters. Sadia understand the waiters forgetting once twice but this was the case most of the time  the waiters seemed confused when basic things were requested -  maybe the waiters were new staff  Sadia will  give the waiters that but should not  be happening with all staff. The staff did not  seem friendly   barely smiled. Sauce bottles were dirty around the opening  with either dried fresh sauce still on the sides. Near the end of the night  Sadia's cousin went to use the single men  washroom    washrooms single toilets sinks my cousin came back saying my cousin could not  use it as someone destroyed the toilet with   . Sadia sat for another       mins eating dessert   noticed none of The staff went to clean the toilets even after my cousin would  let The staff know.
reviews.name: Sadia

reviews.text: the food was tasty but the staff here was rude. Kv think the staff here may be the same staff that used to be rude at food time. the place a couple of doors over is excellent. my opinion.
reviews.name: Kv

reviews.text: The biryani is really good. The service takes quite long. Sofia recommend placing your order before you get there so your order will  be ready. Usmania Grill looked very clean.
reviews.name: Sofia

reviews.text: So happy to find Usmania Grill ! Visited for the first time and have to say was very impressed by the food and the quantity that Usmania Grill give. There were   of us and Kiran ordered the BBQ platter for   which was a very good amount of food. Kiran ended up taking leftovers home. The meats in the dishes were tender and well seasoned. the BBQ platter for   which was a very good amount of food came with chicken tikka  bihari kebobs tandoori chicken and seekh kebobs served on top of biryani rice. Kiran were all very satisfied and happy with the service as well. Definitely recommend people to come try. You wo not  be disappointed. The only thing people need to do is to turn the heat on higher in Usmania Grill. Kiran were eating with Kiran's coats on the whole time !
reviews.name: Kiran

reviews.text: Highly recommend ! Tried chicken biryani and butter chicken and naan and chicken biryani and butter chicken and naan were delicious and great value for   . Looking forward to doing a larger order next time.. !
reviews.name: George

reviews.text: Elizabeth m giving Usmania Grill   stars because the front staff is not friendly at all. Food is great though. Price is great. Elizabeth own a restaurant and staff is what makes a restaurant. Having staff that is incompetent only devalues your food further. Get staff that speak English  knows your product and greets customers well. On the signage outside; you have a sign of a drink called Falooda but Elizabeth asked the waitress and the waitress gave Elizabeth a dirty look. Elizabeth told the waitress a drink called Falooda is  on your A - frame outside and the waitress was confused further. Elizabeth gave up on the waitress and asked another waitress and another waitress was even more incompetent and rude. Anyways; hope the owners read this and make changes. You have  got a good product.
reviews.name: Elizabeth

reviews.text: If you were an avid visitor to Food Time throughout the years  than you are in for a treat. Service is average  but you are  coming for the food not the company. Usmania Grill's space is aesthetically pleasing  and wins in terms of decor Their space strikes more tens across the board. The portions are Great and you get amazing kebabs and it is  well worth the wait for the value. If you are looking for more options in the GTA in Durham region Bushra definitely reccomend Usmania Grill !
reviews.name: Bushra

reviews.text: The food at Usmania Grill is delicious especially Usmania Grill's Kebabs. Best in Pickering by far  only reason Sadia would not  give Usmania Grill five stars is because Usmania Grill's greatest downfall is management. Employees here are very nice however Usmania Grill's management is horrible with food running out frequently at early hours  last minute cancellations and delays in serving. Overall very vey disorganized so if you will be eating there be prepared for that great food polite employees however very disorganized.
reviews.name: Sadia

reviews.text: Usmania Grill takes way too long. If you want their food  consider take out and order at least    minutes in advance. must order fromSuggest doing take out.
reviews.name: pam

reviews.text: Came here for dinner and Sheena loved Usmania Grill. The platters are definitely worth your money. Also you have to order the naan bread with potato inside cus the naan bread with potato inside cus is  sooo good. The staff is also super nice and can not  get enough of The staff's biryani rice. Sheena would definitely come back here for sure. Sheena did not  even know Usmania Grill existed in Pickering.
reviews.name: Sheena

reviews.text: Tried Halwa Puri at Usmania Pickering location today. It was great ! Good portion and size of Halwa Puri. Channa was flavourful and comes with paya which was not bad. Good local joint for Halwa Puri guys !
reviews.name: Tiffy

reviews.text: This review is based on several visits. The food has been consistently great and priced well. Removed stars for the cleanliness and bad attitude of the staff. Denise m here now and just want to get some windex and a rag to clean the front door !  !  ! the staff is never really that nice do not  expect any thank you  or even a smile. Denise will  be back because Denise like The food  the owner is super nice too.. The food could be a five star if they just fixed a few things. Clean the front window it is a customers first impression the staff to be nice to all customers smile say thank you  etc.
reviews.name: Denise

reviews.text: Horrible ! !  !  !  Firstly staff is VERY RUDE !  ! Zaihira Catered for a family event of    people. On the day of a family event of    people Zaihira was given the wrong items. Ordered and paid for Biryani but Zaihira got plain rice instead !  ! Also ran out of food because Zaihira did not  account for the people and give enough. Zaihira was left with hungry guests and bad food. DO NOT CATER from here save Zaihira the embarrassment !  !  !  !

reviews.text: Ordered the Meat Combo for the Meat Combo was fantastic and enough for the three of us  with a lot left over. The food was delicious and exactly the right amount of spices. Staff is very friendly and professional. Will definitely come back again  over and over !
reviews.name: D

reviews.text: Tahira ordered catering for     people for a graduation party. NEVER AGAIN ! Tahira did not  ask for any discount got Usmania Grill's premium package. Usmania Grill delivered two and a half hour late ! The food was COLD ! No time to reheat as guests were already waiting for   hours. Had to serve appetizer that was soggy. Usmania Grill did not  mention that Usmania Grill's naan would be grocery store bought naan. Tahira could have done that. Usmania Grill skimped out on the amount of BBQ Usmania Grill promised. Tahira dealt with Zabar and every time Tahira called no one was allowed to do anything except Zabar. When Tahira called Zabar  Zabar was too busy to talk to us. TOTALLY BAD EXPERIENCE ! Tahira would not recommend Usmania Grill for catering ever !
reviews.name: Tahira

reviews.text: So disappointing. Went for take out. The person at the counter could not speak a word of English. Why would you hire someone that does not  speak English. Not everyone speaks Urdu... food maybe good...crappy service. Do not  waste your time nor money. Tried this new place out of the blue next door. King Samosa and Sweets. Amazing service and good food.
reviews.name: Al

restaurants.name: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery
restaurants.category: Restaurants, Desserts, Custom Cakes, Patisserie/Cake Shop, Food, Indian, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt, Cupcakes, Coffee & Tea

reviews.text: So Lily discovered Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery on the way to the car after dinner next door. Lily ordered three cupcakes ; one coffee flavored  one cookies and cream and one red velvet as well as a cake pop. three cupcakes were all delicious. The frosting is flavorful and the cake very moist. Lily liked one coffee flavored the best but the rest of the  family favored one red velvet but what do the rest of the  family know   ; The best thing about Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is that Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery are egg free ! My daughter has an egg allergy so this was My daughter's first non vegan  read bland and cardboard tasting cupcake. Lily will be back !
reviews.name: Lily

reviews.text: Joshua was afraid there would never be a bakery like Mind Over Batter that could replace Mind Over Batter  but thankfully  Joshua hear about Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery. When Joshua visited  there was only one employee working and there were a lot of customers. Understandable  as it was a Saturday afternoon. Unlike Mind Over Batter  Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is  specialty is more of ice cream instead of baked goods. Joshua wanted to sample all of the fun flavors  but was gracious to the people in line behind Joshua and finished up quickly. Joshua ordered one scoop of malai kulfi and another of gulkand. one scoop of malai kulfi and another of gulkand tasted fantastic ! Joshua will return again to try the other flavors. The woman behind the counter was polite and patient and very helpful in making a selection.
reviews.name: Joshua

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery has a nice clean vibe ! Grace had the cookies and cream and coconut cupcakes ! Also sampled the unique flavors. The young lady behind the counter was super friendly and did not  make us feel bad for sampling so many flavors. The mango and saffron pistachio Grace really good ! Ca not  wait to be back !
reviews.name: Grace

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery Meryl tried the Meetha Paan and the Meetha Paan was delicious. Meryl m not a fan of paan  but the Meetha Paan was irresistible. You should surely try Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery and explore all the different flavors Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have to offer. Whenever Meryl crave for a unique flavored ice cream  Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is going to be Meryl's pick !
reviews.name: Meryl

reviews.text: Looking for a cool sweet treat to cool off this sunny spring day Doreen found Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery ! There is a human - sized ice cream cone in front and inside is very beautiful adorned with this gorgeous photo of a bridge within a cloud forest. Very fair prices for ice cream ! :     . single scoop   . double scoop   . triple scoop The owners are Indian and here The owners carry a variety of unique flavors such as cardamon  fennel seed  rose  saffron pistachio fig chickoo ginger sitaphal  and cashew raisin. There are also other flavors like lychee  green tea  brownie mango butter pecan  cookies and cream tutti fruitti and so much more !  ! Do not  worry you can sample as many flavors as you like before you make a choice. Our ice cream server was so nice as Our ice cream server described the various flavors and made helpful suggestions. Additionally if you need more sugar  there is a variety of delicious cupcakes ! Doreen had the coconut creme and the coconut creme was so luscious and tasty  especially when Doreen threw a dollop of ice cream on top. Doreen will definitely be back very soon !   :
reviews.name: Doreen

reviews.text: Sorry folks  Martha was not impressed. Do not  get me wrong Martha wanted to be. After having dinner at Flanny  Martha had an urge for something sweet to headed over to Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery. At the time Martha went Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery was empty and the selection was very slim. Martha think it was a Sunday so that is  understandable  - -  only a slight deduction for that. Martha inquired about the ice cream flavors and asked if Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery made some of the very exotic flavors that were there and she said no. Hmmm. That did not  resonate with me at all. If Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery are  going to offer such different flavors  but Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery bought such different flavors from a vendor how is that special It just seemed odd to me  especially if Martha m paying THAT much for a scoop of ice cream. Second Martha's cupcake was not to die for. Martha do not  remember the name and that is  sad because again  a cupcake costing that much should be memorable. Martha think my cupcake was   . or so. Martha could be that out of it and not realize that cupcakes are expensive. Regardless  cupcakes were too pricey for Martha  particularly in the calorie department. The space was nice and clean and the service so - so. Martha wish the woman working the counter showed more of the woman working the counter's personality. Perhaps Martha's experience would have been better. Martha love ice cream and Martha's sweet treats but Martha do not  think Martha m going back. Martha wish them all the best though. Small business owners have it so tough.
reviews.name: Martha

reviews.text: LOVE Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery ! Cute little ice cream and dessert spot that is open late  thank you .. ice cream was to die for and looking forward to my cookie... very clean ! Very sweet no pun intended  girls working here and do not  tell girls but Kacee think the prices are too cheap ! Love Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery !
reviews.name: Kacee

reviews.text: Great place.. Great international flavors in ice cream .. Bob enjoyed Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery and will be regular customers ..
reviews.name: Bob

reviews.text: After leaving Victor's truck to get serviced Victor decided to walk around the shopping center. Found Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery by accident. Really good service the girl was very nice and helpful the girl let Victor sample a few flavors before Victor maid Victor's final decision.
reviews.name: Victor

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is a wonderful place ! Great for all ages and all sweet lovers ! It was so peaceful and happy ! The cupcakes were fantastic and ice cream was yummy. How awesome Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery stay open late and staff was so friendly ! Will always come here when Rachel am in town. A must !
reviews.name: Rachel

reviews.text: Very new ice cream shop  right next to Chris's favorite Thai place. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have all sorts of ice cream. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery even have some Indian inspired flavors. Personally  some Indian inspired flavors are not for Chris. Chris's wife loved some Indian inspired flavors though. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have normal flavors as well and normal flavors are awesome. Nice way to top off the night.
reviews.name: Chris

reviews.text: Moved away from the area six months ago and stopped next door for a pedi at Gemma's old salon. When Gemma's tech mentioned Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery had changed ownership  Gemma decided to give Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery a try since the last place was not  a favorite. Gemma m so glad Gemma did ! The cupcake was delicious...gobbled up in the car before even leaving the parking lot after thinking Gemma would  just have a little taste since The cupcake smelled soooo good ! The Gemma have cream looks amazing  next time   and Gemma will  report back on hubby  review of the brownie Gemma m taking home to allay Gemma's brownie guilt ! That is  if the brownie Gemma m taking home even makes it home...
reviews.name: Gemma

reviews.text: Renée came here a few weeks after Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery opened. Renée am not a fan. Renée got ice cream and cupcakes. Renée sampled a few ice cream flavours and a few ice cream flavours were all gritty. The ice cream is not  smooth at all. Renée am not a fan of that. The two cupcakes Renée got were both very dry  which was unfortunate. Renée wo not  be back.
reviews.name: Renée

reviews.text: The ice cream was not fresh and did not have a good texture.
reviews.name: Rajul

reviews.text: My family was so excited to try the Indian flavors at Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery but when Meghna got there Meghna were so disappointed. The staff was friendly and Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery was nice and clean  but the ice cream was pathetic. the Indian flavors were very muted and the ice cream was not very creamy. the ice cream seemed icy and not smooth. Meghna had the mango and the mango's flavor was barely present. The malai kulfi was a bit creamier but The malai kulfi came far from close to authentic kulfi. Overall  Meghna were very disappointed !  !
reviews.name: Meghna

reviews.text: best place to get your Indian Ice Cream fix  Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have a great assortment of different flavors from Meetha Pan to Malai Kulfi to Mango. The employees are all very kind and more than willing to give samples.
reviews.name: Zakir

reviews.text: Such great ice cream -  -  Amani got coffee but the fig was great too !  ! The cupcakes looked delicious as well. The customer service was extraordinary; she was patient and very helpful. And to top it all off the seating was awesome. Amani got to enjoy the couch area and listen to some great music.
reviews.name: Amani

reviews.text: Arrived early to see a movie at Pollak Cinema and decided to check out Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery. Warm and inviting  clean  and comfortable. Casandra welcomed us with a cheerful heart  explained the flavors  and invited us to sample those Brian were interested in. Brian ordered Kaju Draksh and Lightly Gingered. Brian's girlfriend ordered Pineapple Coconut and Banana Nut. Brian also shared a Coconut Vanilla cupcake. s across the board. Will be back !
reviews.name: Brian

reviews.text: My review would admittedly be a little higher had Brian not been such a huge fan of Mind Over Batter. It may not be fair  but Brian found myself comparing Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery with one of my old faves. Brian did not have any ice cream but Brian did have two cupcakes. two cupcakes were good. No complaints  but no real wow factor either. What Brian did love was the atmosphere. the atmosphere  a nice cool environment with comfortable seating and enjoyable contemporary music playing in the background. That will probably bring us back a few more times. Love that Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery continued a deal with Pollack Cinemas and give a discount for theater - goers.
reviews.name: Brian

reviews.text: Best Indian ice cream !  ! Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery has an awesome assortment of both Indian and Traditional flavors. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery has become a regular spot for grabbing ice cream for Vivek and Vivek's friends ! Vivek love the meetha pan and malai kulfi flavors !  !
reviews.name: Vivek

reviews.text: Laurie used to go here when it was Mind Over Batter. Did not  know it was not  there anymore and wanted a cupcake today when Laurie was in that area so Laurie went in.. Laurie am so glad Laurie only bought one !  ! Laurie was stale and dry..seemed more like a biscuit than a cupcake.. Laurie wo not  be going there again
reviews.name: Laurie

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery offers Indian Inspired flavored ice creams  regular ice cream cake pops  cup cakes  coffee and more. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery  a lovely sleek looking cafe with modern rich looking features. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery offer mostly counter seating and do have two tiny tables. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery do offer you samples of the ice cream to try. Pepper first tried saffron pistachio and the second one lightly ginger seemed better. Pepper's husband only sampled what Pepper tried and just ordered the carrot halwa ice cream. The ginger ice cream had a texture that was light and very unique. The flavor was intensely ginger and was sort of spicy but refreshing. Pepper tried a taste of Pepper's husband  carrot halwa flavor ice cream. Both of us did not  care for the carrot halwa ice cream mostly because of the greasy texture. The girl working the counter was pleasant and efficient and Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery seemed clean and spotless. Pepper's main reason for the two star rating is that Pepper was there forty minutes after Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery were open and not one baked good was ready for sale. Pepper wanted to bring home some baked goods and Pepper live far from here and Pepper m not always in this area so Pepper doubt Pepper will  be back. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery has potential to be a gem but you have to get there when Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery are ready to be open for business.
reviews.name: Pepper

reviews.text: Rucha am so glad Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery exists ! Go - To place when Rucha m craving Indian flavored ice - cream. Really loved the kesar pista the kesar pista is  obviously creamy ice - cream but the kesar pista has the perfect kulfi flavor. Rucha really enjoyed the meetha paan flavor too the meetha paan flavor is  strong but awesome just what you expect out of a beetle leaf and fennel seeds. The rest were good too  sitaphal malai kulfi  gulkand. Not tried the standard flavors or cupcakes. Rucha will  give it a   just for the Indian flavored ice - cream the Indian flavored ice - cream is  that good.
reviews.name: Rucha

reviews.text: Stopped by with the family and wanted to try out the unique flavors. William ended up getting the saffron and pistachio nut. The saffron flavored ice cream tasted ok  but was hoping for a stronger flavor. The pistachio nut was the one that William had more issues around as even though The pistachio nut did have pistachios in The pistachio nut The pistachio nut tasted very artificial. William will come back to try out some other flavors to see if The pistachio nut was just a one off...
reviews.name: William

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery   Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery serve the traditional popular ice cream flavors AND unique Indian inspired favors. Amy went just a day or two after Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery opened for business. The staff was friendly  welcoming and helpful. Amy will definitely go back for more and to try Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery's cupcakes and coffees.
reviews.name: Amy

reviews.text: Lots of ice cream choices and unique flavors ! The girl helping us Cassandra  was very friendly and helped us find flavors chris did not  even know existed ! Definitely worth a trip if you are  in the area !
reviews.name: chris

reviews.text: Very interesting ice cream infused with Indian spices like saffron and cardamom. Apparently Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have new ownership coming and will be called Red Lentil. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery also have regular fare -  Rene's husband really liked the pistachio.
reviews.name: Rene

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is a nice place to hangout. Great flavors. Raunacq's favorite was the mango flavor. Pan masala gives u a kick  a must have. Lychee  -  malai kulfi were good too.
reviews.name: Raunacq

reviews.text: Andrea have been to Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery  three times and have enjoyed Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery more with each visit. The first time Andrea got a chocolate cupcake and a vanilla cupcake. a chocolate cupcake and a vanilla cupcake were very moist and the frosting was fine -  - nothing special. But the second time Andrea tried the coffee cupcake and the coffee cupcake was AMAZING. Andrea went back again the same week to get the coffee cupcake again. And now Andrea wish Andrea had one in my hand this second.
reviews.name: Andrea

reviews.text: Jen came here for a sunday afternoon treat. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery was quite spacious inside. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is in the same plaza as tempe cinemas youll know when your in the right place because there is a giant ice cream statue outside.. Jen tried all the indian flavors but all the indian flavors were too strong for us Jen eventually went with butter pecan and fig which had a light butter flavor. Jen got a double scoop which was plenty for the both of us. The size was for refernce like a Coldstone Love a Coldstone size. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery also had really beautifully decorated cupcakes. Jen got the the coffee butter cream cupcake and the the coffee butter cream cupcake looked almost too pretty to eat.. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is a cute place to have girl chat and desserts will be back to try more cupcakes.
reviews.name: Jen

reviews.text: So  this is the former location of  Mind Over Batter  cake shop. Austen was looking for some cupcakes for my wife  birthday and the reviews for Mind Over Batter cake shop were very good. The pictures of the cakes looked great too. When Austen arrived and saw it was now Jalsa Austen was disappointed but since Mind Over Batter  cake shop also had cupcakes Austen gave Mind Over Batter  cake shop a try. Austen picked up a lemon  vanilla  chocolate chip and toasted coconut for a total of over    . Austen do not  know when cupcakes were made but Austen could have  thrown cupcakes through a glass window. cupcakes looked great but cupcakes were hard and stale. The frosting was bland and overall Austen was very disappointed. My kids would not  even eat cupcakes. When an   and   year old wo not  eat cake you know cake is  bad. Austen can not  speak for Mind Over Batter  cake shop's ice cream but Mind Over Batter cake shop need to get out of the cake business. Austen wo not  be back.
reviews.name: Austen

reviews.text: Stopped by here today  Becky do not  eat cupcakes very often  and did not  realise Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery was not   that other bakery  any longer. Since Becky was already there Becky decided to give Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery a shot. The cupcakes all look very pretty. If this was based off of service  Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery would get a  . The young woman working today was very friendly. Becky came for cupcakes  but The young woman working that day was happy to let Becky try some of the interesting Indian inspired ice cream flavors too. Interesting. Not bad. Interesting. Becky ordered four different cupcakes. All nice looking. All incredibly dry. Becky am a terrible baker and Becky could have made better cupcakes from a box. The peanut butter frosting and the Oreo frostings were fine. Nothing amazing but Becky want the cake part to be the hero of the cupcake. Not even close. Becky sadly wo not  be back. You get two stars for your awesome staff member. Keep Becky around ! Becky wish Becky caught The young woman working that day's name . Next time  Becky will  probably cross the street to Kneaders. Becky would  also be better off at Safeway.
reviews.name: Becky

reviews.text: NO STARS My GF and Om had some extreme munchies going on one night recently and wanted some vegan ice cream. Looked Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery up online and it said Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery had some options available... Om get there and Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery are busy no biggie. When our turn came Om asked the young lady behind the counter to point out Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery's vegan options to save time on trying to figure out which ones were and which ones were not  . the young lady behind the counter looked at Om like Om was from another planet. the young lady behind the counter said oh Om do not  have their vegan options . Om said it says the young lady behind the counter do online... Nothing. Om look around and on a chalk board menu it plainly said that Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery had vegan date shakes ! Om m thinking score ! the young lady behind the counter turns around to look at a chalk board menu like the young lady behind the counter has no idea vegan date shakes was even written there. Turns back around and shrugs and says sorry Om do not  have vegan date shakes either. Fail.
reviews.name: Om

reviews.text: Good variety of Indian and western flavors. Ketan loved Meetha Pan  a must . Chiku and Sitafal flavors were not good.
reviews.name: Ketan

reviews.text: The cardamom flavor is excellent ! It is a must try !
reviews.name: Kay

reviews.text: Great ice cream. Loved the Indian inspired flavors ! The standard flavors were excellent quality too. service was wonderful staff was very friendly. Only negatives are :  poor seating arrangement  for families no customer restroom    Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery serve coffee but no espresso. Otherwise  Jeff would be   stars !
reviews.name: Jeff

reviews.text: Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery serves ice cream and few other dessert items like brownie sundaes  cupcakes  etc. Sylvia was impressed by the different types of ice cream Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery carried. Flavors ranged from the usual to more exotic flavors. Sylvia think they are  Indian food - inspired ice cream  but Sylvia cannot confirm this since Sylvia did not  ask and since Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery's website social media is down. Sylvia was able to sample a lot of flavors and a lot of flavors were pretty good ! However  a lot of a lot of flavors had freezer burn and did not  seem fresh. Sylvia got the falooda ice cream Sylvia love falooda  and the falooda ice cream was delicious ! Sylvia would go back and get the falooda ice cream again. The facilities The facilities itself had nice aesthetics. The facilities itself was pretty clean and well - maintained. Service was mediocre. The young lady working seemed to be in the  scoop and go  mindset. The young lady working gave me the impression that The young lady working did not  know very much about the flavors. Sylvia also did not  feel engaged by The young lady working after asking for recommendations. A lot of places have service like this and it is ok. It just means service was average and nothing spectacular.
reviews.name: Sylvia

reviews.text: Basis for my starred ratings  which skews heavily to the food or drink  : star : Never again. stars : Poor food  poor experience extraordinary measures in order for Rich to come back. stars : Average  nothing really special  nothing particularly bad. stars : Very good  would definitely return. stars : A favorite  one of the best. Rich love ice cream. Rich have  had amazing ice cream all over the country. See review for Sweet Republic on Shea . Rich really  really wanted to truly love Sweet Republic on Shea as much as Rich loved the Indian - inspired ice cream joint that Rich went to in Columbus  OH. But sorry to say  Rich can not . Not quite yet. Rich had no problems with the flavors at all. Rich ordered the kulfi and saffron. the kulfi and saffron tasted fine  saffron was great  even. The one thing that killed the   or   - star review One of the flavors was over - icy and the other was freezer burned. The texture and consistency were off. Off enough to make me concerned if Rich would return. But Rich will return. Hopefully  better texture in the future. And you should go. Because the staff is friendly  because the staff have Indian inspired flavors  and Indian inspired flavors are good to great. Looking forward to a review update and a higher rating.
reviews.name: Rich

reviews.text: So long Mind Over Batter  hello Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery ! Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is kind of like the former store  except kicked up a notch. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have cupcakes and cake pops  and an extensive variety of ice cream. About half the flavors are Indian inspired with selections such as mango cardamom ginger  and saffron pistachio. The prices were very reasonable for the ice cream and scoops are quite generous. Karen sampled a few flavors  Saffron pistachio  sapota fruit  ginger  before deciding on the ginger  single scoop. All the samples overall had good flavor but had a grainy texture to All the samples. Karen enjoyed the spicy kick of ginger flavor and the spicy kick of ginger flavor was a perfect sweetness. Karen's friend asked for a half scoop of black cherry and a half scoop of banana nut and it looked like My friend got a full scoop each when My friend got My friend's cup. My friend said My friend enjoyed the flavor of banana nut especially. cupcakes and cake pops are beautifully decorated. Karen will  definitely have to try one next time with another scoop of ice cream.
reviews.name: Karen

reviews.text: Joyce's head said go to the gym but Joyce's heart said eat more ice cream... Joyce have  been eyeing Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery for a while. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery took over Mind Over Batter and Joyce have  been wanting to poke Joyce's head in to see what Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery had to offer. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is exactly a mile away from Joyce's gym and Joyce always see Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery when Joyce are  heading to EOS. After an incredibly filling dinner today  like Joyce seriously thought Joyce was gonna explode Joyce had contemplated going to the gym but Joyce remembered that Joyce have  been wanting to try out Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery. So obviously  Joyce are  gonna get ice cream instead of working out. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery carry    flavors and about half flavors are Indian inspired. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have fig  fennel tastes like you poured lavender essential oil on your tongue cardamom cashew raisin  et cetera. Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery also have your basic flavors like butterscotch and tutti frutti if you are  not as adventurous. Joyce's pal Linh L. and Joyce ended up ordering Kelsa Pistachio Saffron Pistachio  and Rose ice cream. They were both crazy delicious and refreshing. The ice cream was dense and creamy and even as Joyce stood there waiting for My pal Linh L. to try a bunch of flavors The ice cream did not  melt in this Arizona heat. Wow ! All in all  Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery is a cute little ice cream shop with lots to offer. A single scoop ice cream in a cup is   . so feel free to indulge without breaking the bank !
reviews.name: Joyce

reviews.text: Leslie came to Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery to check out Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery's cakes the owners sister showed my boyfriend and Leslie pictures of cakes Jalsa Ice Cream and Bakery have made for events since Leslie were looking for a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday. cakes they have made for events looked really well made so our expectations were high  hoping a custom cake to be made for our daughters st birthday was going to look really good ! The day of our daughters  st birthday comes  a custom cake to be made for our daughters st birthday is delivered  when Leslie saw a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday  a custom cake to be made for our daughters st birthday was horrible ! In all honesty  Leslie was very disappointed Leslie hated a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday. First of all  Leslie asked for a marble cake  which is chocolate and vanilla swirls. a custom cake to be made for our daughters st birthday was chocolate with a layer of white cream in the middle ! a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday looked so ugly ! a custom cake to be made for our daughters st birthday was a cake covered in fondant. a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday had cracks all over a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday ! a custom cake to be made for our daughters  st birthday had pink strips on a custom cake to be made for our daughters st birthday were all unevenly cut ! Leslie feel like the baker had no experience with fondant. Leslie feel  knowing the process of fondant is a necessary skill for a baker and if you do not  know how to use the process of fondant  the process of fondant should be told to a customer at the least. Over all  it was a horrible experience Leslie would never go back.
reviews.name: Leslie

reviews.text: buffet lunch is a great deal. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant offered butter chicken  shahi paneer daal naan that was a bit tough   veggie pekoras papadums soggy  veggie pekoras in a curry sauce goat salad  rice  and desserts. There is lots of space for groups to just show up unannounced  and Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant sell sweets in Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant's attached bakery. The only issue Felicia had was that it took about    minutes to order and receive some chai tea. Felicia will definitely be back. It was not  busy and the food was great  :
reviews.name: Felicia

reviews.text: Jessica am definitely not a connoisseur of Indian sweets but it does not  take an expert to know that the sweet baked goods at Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant are great ! The first time Jessica drove by Jessica was intrigued by the name; the next time Jessica decided to stop in. As you enter Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant you pass through the sweet shop where amazing Indian treats are sold by weight. Jessica have no idea what Jessica tried  one was a sweet  spongey cake - like thing that was white on one end and light brown on the other ; Jessica also tried a more dense white square with pistachios on top but they were incredible ! Jessica have  also brought out - of - town guests to Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant to sample the sweet baked goods at Bikaner Sweets House and Restaurant and out - of - town guests agree with Jessica -  the sweet baked goods at Bikaner Sweets House and Restaurant is  all absolutely delicious ! The staff there are always so nice to Jessica and Jessica never feel like The staff there are  judging Jessica because Jessica do not  know the different sweets. Jessica will definitely return in the future to try Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant -  if the food is half as good as Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant's sweets it will be worth it !
reviews.name: Jessica

reviews.text: Surprise ! Tiffany are  eating here ! Tiffany thought Tiffany were just stopping here to pick up some sweets but Tiffany m glad to finally check Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant off of Tiffany's bookmarks. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is not  exactly close to where Tiffany live and it is  pretty safe to say that it is  worth the trip. The Pindi Chana was delicious  as was the Afghani Pulao  even though Tiffany really dislike dried fruits in Tiffany's food . Minus one star because the server kept forgetting our drinks. the server  but very forgetful. Then  when Tiffany were paying for our food it took Tiffany forever to get to the till. Then  when picking up sweets it took someone five minutes to show up at the counter. Tiffany were the only people in Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant so Tiffany worry how service would be if it was a busy night. Vegetarians be wary; chicken is listed among the  vegetarian  dishes. Tiffany was not  completely worried about this  because Tiffany's friend Vishnu considers my friend Vishnu a vegetarian  even though my friend Vishnu eats fish; chicken and lamb. Lots of ethnic restaurants assume that when you say you do not  eat meat you mean you do not  eat beef and or pork. The servers are careful though  so do not  be afraid to ask questions. Be assured that what you will get will be delicious  :  .
reviews.name: Tiffany

reviews.text: Excellent Indian food. Serena was told by a friend  in the know  to eat here tonight for an early dinner. The buffet was    . which seemed expensive but wow. Great food. Every bite of every thing was so exquisite. The first plate of food Serena took was literally polished off. Serena ate every single thing on The first plate of food Serena took. Second plate almost the same and thinking back to the few bites Serena left behind... Serena wish Serena had the few bites Serena left behind now. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant was described to me as a  hole in the wall  but Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant was spacious and had a charm about Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant that was nice. Serena asked about the chefs since the food was so outstanding. the chefs are  trained in India and there are three : one for the Tandoor meats and naan  one for curries and vegetarian and the other something fantastic that Serena forget now because you see  Serena am now experiencing a lovely food coma  remembering the butter chicken  rice and tender spice battered fish. The dessert and chutneys were so good too. So glad Serena went.
reviews.name: Serena

reviews.text: Mia came ALLLL the way from the SW up to Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant for a Sangeet  ladies party for Indian women getting married  Mia cant comment on the cost  and since Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant was crazy busy with ladies all over the place and Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant was buffet style the service seemed as quick as the service could be  trying to dodge all the women  while picking up plates and refilling waters. The food was amazing !  !  ! Butter Chicken was to die for. Not too tomato - ey The sauce is a little more thin than Miam used to but the taste more than made up for it. From the naan to the pakora to the peas pulao..everything was perfectly cooked and moist. Mia actually would travel the distance again to go back and try more of their food.
reviews.name: Mia

reviews.text: Pouria had been searching and craving for good Indian food for about   years and Pouria finally found some in Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant ! It  not the best Indian food Pouria have  had in Pouria's life but it is  as good as you can get in Calgary. Pouria ordered two portions and almost finished two portions ! The chicken vindaloo was amazing and the biryani rice was pretty good too. The naan was not too bad either. The appetizer Veg Pakora was just too good as well. There is a whole lot more on that menu that Pouria have to try...
reviews.name: Pouria

reviews.text: The food here is really good. Kelly drive from the south just to come here to eat. The only thing Kelly am not a fan of is that the service is not very good. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant are very friendly but a little slow to take your order and to see how things are at the end of your meal. Another thing is it seems that Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant's cooks change often and you get a different dish each time It is still amazing but not consistent. Kelly still love Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant's food though
reviews.name: Kelly

reviews.text: My partner and Nadine came in for the dinner buffet on a Sunday. No special weekend pricing unlike most Indian buffets  -  it seems to be     per person for dinner every day  surprisingly cheap for a non - vegetarian buffet . Nadine loved everything ! The butter paneer was probably My partner and Nadine's favourite  but the butter chicken was definitely up there. Though the dinner buffet was not  very busy  fresh food was brought out more often than Nadine have  seen at any other buffet. The host    was pleasant and helped My partner and Nadine to identify what everything was. Nadine will definitely be back. Edit :  Came back on a Thursday night and had a slightly different experience. The food was not  super fresh  but certainly still edible. the butter chicken was completely different than the one Nadine had on a Sunday  -  the butter chicken tasted  to me  like the butter chicken was just cooked in a can of tomato soup. The butter paneer was still very good. The dessert  vermicelli kheer  tasted like plain milk with some noodles thrown in  and the jalebi was quite soggy. Nadine were the only people there and noticed that Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant closed up right after Nadine left  though it was just after   :    PM so maybe Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant were just having an off day. The service was fine  and the man who was very helpful last time the gesture My partner and Nadine fresh naan which was unfortunately quite burnt  though Nadine appreciated the gesture . The pakoras were still amazing  -  among the best Nadine have  had. Nadine previously gave five stars  but Nadine have  revised my rating to   due to the apparent decrease in food quality on weekdays.
reviews.name: Nadine

reviews.text: Pouria wrote a flattering review of Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant in late     . Pouria was so excited and amazed by the food here. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant had a small menu with really tasty food. Everything was impressive and the pakoras were the best Pouria would  ever had. So Pouria got a chance to come back a few weeks ago. a small menu with really tasty food had changed  a small menu with really tasty food is  freaking huge now. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant added Pouria's all time favorite  tandoori chicken. So Pouria ordered my all time favorite  tandoori chicken and my all time favorite  tandoori chicken was utterly disappointing. my all time favorite  tandoori chicken was among the worst Pouria have  had in Pouria's life. Pouria could swear my all time favorite  tandoori chicken had nothing in my all time favorite  tandoori chicken except food coloring and maybe a little salt. Pouria tasted the lamb curry and something else Pouria do not  remember and there was nothing special about any of the food here. Pouria's conclusion is Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant either have a new chef or s he just gave up on cooking.
reviews.name: Pouria

reviews.text: Came in for a quick lunch the food was pretty good although a couple of the trays were empty and never replenished during our visit  about    mins. . Being from the Toronto area Ryan have definitely been to better Indian buffets but the price was right. One thing that was really surprising was that there was this constant beeping noise in Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant that never went away  this constant beeping noise in the restaurant that never went away would go off every    seconds or so. Nobody seemed interested in doing anything about this constant beeping noise in the restaurant that never went away but this constant beeping noise in the restaurant that never went away was quite annoying to listen to for that long.
reviews.name: Ryan

reviews.text: BEST INDIAN FOOD IN THE CITY ! !  !  !  !           A friend suggested Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant to me a while ago  but Rand did not  check Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant out until about a couple months ago when Rand found myself in the NE part of THE CITY. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is the kind of place that you could drive by and never really pay attention to  -  Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is  quite unassuming from the exterior. But as soon as you step in  you are  greeted by friendly servers  who might take a second glance and instantly acknowledge that you do not  live in the NE part of Calgary . In a nutshell  Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is the best Indian Rand have  had in THE CITY. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is also ridiculously cheap  which does not  hurt either ; The interior is very spacious  with a full bar and open dancefloor Rand think   which is available for event bookings. Safe to say my friends and Rand have become regulars here  for both the delicious buffet  at   . you can not  go wrong  and dinner service. Rand usually order the butter chicken and goat curry with basmati rice and garlic naan bread all of which are cooked and spiced to perfection by the entertaining staff at Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is a hidden GEM in THE CITY and you will  be coming back time and time again   -  or in my case  three times in ten days  :
reviews.name: Rand

reviews.text: Sapna visited Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant today for the first time and Sapna gotta say  Sapna was very impressed ! Sapna tried Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant's lunch buffet and their lunch buffet was good ! The food was excellent  the space is decent and the service was good. their lunch buffet runs   days a week from    : am  -   pm and it is  only   .   ! Plus on Tuesdays it is  only   .   ! What a steal ! The only reason Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant lost a star is because Sapna was disappointed that Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant did not  have milai kofta in Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant's buffet. The selection was a bit limited   but what Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant DID have was excellent. Oh and take my word for it  -  the gulab jamuns are THE BEST gulab jamuns Sapna have EVER had. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is definitely a hot spot  -  check Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant out fo sure !
reviews.name: Sapna

reviews.text: The buffet was awesome  everything taste great ! Enjoyed the Mutton rogan josh... Tasted like home  :
reviews.name: Kunwer

reviews.text: Ooh ! The flavors. Yes Ammar am starting Ammar's review with this. If you have eaten foods in the streets of India  or have gone to the dhabas on the highways in India you are going to relive that in your mouth. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant is an unconventional restaurant Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant has sweet shop on the front and restaurant inside. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant has nice dining setup. Ammar went in for dinner and Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant turned out to have a dinner buffet. Ammar was craving for good veggies and here good veggies were laid in front of Ammar along with chutneys  pickles and sauces. Aloo gobhi  potato and cauliflower   sitaphal pumpkin dal  were all so authentic and homelike that a morsel in the mouth and a morsel in the mouth could just melt your heart. Oh ! The flavors  the spices just right. The naans were nicely done and crisp. To top it the dessert  jalebis and gulab jamun were among the best Ammar have had in North America. They can work on their entrance though.
reviews.name: Ammar

reviews.text: Seems like Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant was not  really heard much around. Vishnu had an invitation today for lunch from a friend  and then Vishnu understood that Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant serve food as well. From the outer picture of Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant it does not  seem like there are some awesome hidden food treasures inside  : P .. After having food  Vishnu just thought how did Vishnu miss Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant was big enough to handle our group of    people. Spacious !  ! Vishnu did not  really have a chance to drill through the menu as it was already decided to go for a buffet. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant had chilli chicken butter chicken  tandoori chicken lamb curry fish fry shahi panneer  panneer tikka dal bhindi fry indian okra   fruits chat  similar to salsa dessert gilebi gulab jamoon sweets  and few other salads  yogurt with onion etc. Vishnu do not  think there was beef and pork. Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant had saffron rice and naan  papadum too.. The best one that could steal me was chilli chicken. Stuffed up my stomach with chilli chicken as much as possible as if Vishnu might not find that taste again. Shahi panneer  fish fry panneer tikka were equally good. Fruits were fresh and tasty. Good bollywood music. Service was good too. And the whole bunch is just for  .   !  ! A great deal.. and from past two years there was not much increment in the price too But what made me to rate the price was due to few shortfalls. Tandoori chicken was not at all good. Restroom was just one for both men and women and once you enter through one door there will be two doors w o any symbols or signs on one door. Fortunately the third door had EXIT on the third door. So now it is  your hit or miss with the rest two. Overall -  A must try place. Value and taste for money. Really worth it.
reviews.name: Vishnu

restaurants.name: Samosa Factory

reviews.text: Emily have  had my eye on Samosa Factory for some time  but finally got around to trying Samosa Factory last night when our first choice for dinner was closed for the holiday. Emily entered the small dining area and were greeted by the incredibly friendly server. Emily told the incredibly friendly server Emily wanted to order our food to - go and the incredibly friendly server still offered us two glasses of water and a starter to nibble on while Emily perused the menu. Emily settled on the Lamb Vindaloo and the Chicken Tikka Masala. Emily also ordered some garlic naan. Our server was incredibly personable and offered us refills on our water while Emily waited as well as made some idle chit chat with us. Once our food arrived  Emily paid our bill and off Emily went with our food. the incredibly friendly server also offered us a to - go menu for our return visit. Great customer service ! My fella and Emily dug into My fella and Emily's meal as soon as Emily got home. The spice level was just right. Emily ordered the medium spice level to be on the safe side on our first visit. some garlic naan was delicious and Emily really enjoyed the rice. The flavors were right on and Emily look forward to a return visit to hopefully eat in Samosa Factory and try some of Samosa Factory's samosas. The food is not cheap  but Emily did not  feel The food was overly expensive for the quantity and quality of food Emily got. Definitely a great Indian option in a town that is lacking.
reviews.name: Emily

reviews.text: Hayley's new favorite spot in Vegas ! Hayley go at least once a week. The Malai Kofta Korma is just DELICIOUS as well as the vegetable Samosa   garlic naan and Hayley m sure everything else on the menu. My new favorite spot in Vegas  great service  and food to die for. thumbs up !
reviews.name: Hayley

reviews.text: Tanya love Samosa Factory  Rick the new owner is very accomodating. Rick's friend from England always has to visit Samosa Factory when My friend from England is here My friend from England's fav dish is chicken korma Rick is veggie kofta with mahkni sauce. Samosa Factory have great lunch specials too !

reviews.text: Best Indian restaurant Sebastien have found town. Authentic  FRESH  with a wide selection of home made chutneys. And all reasonably priced !

Butter Chicken and Malai Kofta Korma vegetarian  are some of Sue's favorites... Do not  forget your veggie samosa or the mango lassi. Amazing. The food is always so fresh and perfect each time ! The owner is also super friendly and Samosa Factory have excellent service ! Make a point to visit Samosa Factory and get some yummy food  :

reviews.text: This was my first time trying Indian food Tomeca loved it ! Tomeca can not  wait to go back and try more things ! The service was great as well ! Tomeca would definatly recommend this to anyone who is trying for the first time  -  great experience !

reviews.text: Jenna was visiting from Philly and wanted delicious Indian food for lunch. Upon doing a Google search  Samosa Factory was the only place with excellent reviews so Jenna tried Samosa Factory for Jenna. Jenna was not disappointed ! The guy who served Jenna was so pleasant. The food came out in a short amount of time. Jenna ordered a vegetarian dish with naan and iced chai. The flavors was so amazing ! Jenna loved that Samosa Factory give you just one heaping scoop of rice because Jenna do not  like too much of just one heaping scoop of rice. Could only eat half Jenna's meal so Jenna was given a container for the food and a little bag for naan and bonus :  a to go cup for Jenna's iced chai ! Jenna found that to be very thoughtful. Samosa Factory is not  a big place but the decor is nice and warm. Jenna wanted to go back before leaving but never got the chance. Jenna highly recommend Samosa Factory !
reviews.name: Jenna

reviews.text: Amber have  been hearing good things about Samosa Factory for years  but had yet to make it over there until tonight. Samosa Factory does not  look like much from the outside  but Samosa Factory is  really cozy cute inside. The tables   chairs leave a bit to be desired  but Samosa Factory really did a lot with the decor to improve the ambiance. Amber ordered Chicken Vindaloo   Hot Sour Chicken  which were both good. Chicken Vindaloo was awesome really spicy   delicious. The hot   sour chicken was good but all the sesame seeds in the sauce were a bit much for Amber texture - wise. Amber also had a hot chai  which was perfect. The owner came by and talked to us  asking us what Amber thought of Samosa Factory and how Amber would  heard of Samosa Factory. The owner was really nice and made Amber feel very welcome and appreciated as a new customer. Also  they were playing great music. Right after finishing Amber's meal  while sipping on Amber's tea Amber's favorite Amber's Morning Jacket song came on  -  it was a really nice moment.
reviews.name: Amber

reviews.text: Yummy Veggie friendly food ! The owner is very nice  and very friendly ! Best Chutney in Vegas... See for yourself ! This place is bomb diggity ! = oP

reviews.text: Paul have eaten here regularly for quite some time. The food is consistently delicious. Paul's favorite dish is the lamb curry lunch w  Garlic naan and iced tea. Paul think Samosa Factory is a best kept secret in Las Vegas  :  -

reviews.text: Emma miss Samosa Factory sooooo much ! Samosa Factory  honestly deliciousness in the best way ! The Kashmiri naan filled with dates cannot be rivaled ! And Emma m excited to enjoy Samosa Factory again !

reviews.text: The food was delicious. Linda enjoyed every item Linda ordered  Chicken Tikka  Malai Kofta Korma  Tandoori Chicken  and the garlic Naan . But the service was horrible and made Linda  Linda's children  and Linda's guests not want to come back. Both she and Linda's waiter was overly aggressive. First Our waiter constantly pushed Both she and Linda to make an order and when Linda made one Our waiter kept pushing for Both she and Linda to get an appetizer  even when Linda calmly declined. When Linda did get Both she and Linda's food Our waiter served our food and sat on the side a little bit back at one of the tables on Our waiter's phone. When Linda were done Linda paid the bill and left. As Linda were outside putting Both she and Linda's four children into the car  ages six and below Our waiter came outside and angrily began to yell at Both she and Linda for not leaving a tip. Our waiter continued to yell at Both she and Linda about the  kind of people Linda were  to come to a  full service  restaurant without bringing enough for a tip. Linda's children were upset and confused as well as Linda's friends child. Both she and Linda left quickly to avoid any more of this behavior in front of Both she and Linda's kids. Linda were completely embarrassed by Our waiter  actions. The reason Linda did not  leave a tip is irrelevant. Our waiter never should have reacted in that manner  especially to Both she and Linda and Both she and Linda's four little kids. unacceptable. So in conclusion  Five stars for The food but zero stars for the service. If you do go be sure to bring tip money or beware.

reviews.text: P's friend and P decided to try out another Indian restaurant and came to Samosa Factory. P's friend ordered My friend usual and P tried something new. P's dish was quite okay  nothing to brag about. P's friend  chicken dish My friend said My friend  chicken dish was okay as well. The garlic naan bread The garlic naan bread tasted a little bland. reviews.text: Nathan have  been to several of the more popular Indian restaurants in Vegas  and this is by far Nathan's favourite ! Samosas are always fresh and flavourful  with a nice mix of subtle spices that is well - complimented by a selection of chutneys ! Hot  crispy perfection ! The Lamb Korma is pure curry heaven  too. The boneless lamb is always tender and super - tasty  with creamy sauce over fresh garlic naan and aromatic basmati rice. Is your mouth watering yet Then get off the Internet and into your car. Head down to Samosa Factory for the best Indian food Vegas has to offer RIGHT NOW ! ! :  -
reviews.name: Nathan

reviews.text: Jake tried Samosa Factory a few years ago and was disappointed Jake decided to give Samosa Factory a try one more time this week. The first time Jake showed up during this week at  pm and Samosa Factory were closed. The next day Jake decided to show up for lunch and Jake knew Jake would be cutting it close to the   :    lunch closing. Jake tried calling from my car at   : but Jake only got the answering machine. Jake walked in at   :    and was told Samosa Factory were closed. Jake was a little steamed. Jake was told Samosa Factory shut off the phones at   :   . Jake said  really . So Jake showed up today Saturday no lunch specials so Jake order the full chicken curry entree. Talk about a disappointment. A clump of plain white rice and a bowl of brown soup with a couple of chunks of chicken. the full chicken curry entree was like maybe one leg. The sauce was bland. Jake will go to the strip to Tambla  or Mantra Masala. Never ever going here again.
reviews.name: Jake

reviews.text: Chris wanted to go to Panda Express  one entrance east . Chris just wanted to get something quick while running an errand and scooting back to the conference Chris was attending. minutes later  Chris's belly was full of   veggie samosas and full veggie thali and Chris was a happy boy. Chris do not  dig raitha so Chris sub would  aloo gobi without asking Chris. How did Chris know Could Chris read Chris's mind  Amazing ! possibly  Sad News : Chris chatted with the owners and the owners admitted that the owners were selling the place. When that happens  Chris sure hope the lucky inheritor of the place continues the owners's fine tradition.
reviews.name: Chris

reviews.text: Went to Samosa Factory with a dear friend for lunch. Aaron was greeted by the staff and Aaron were ushered to a dear friend's usual table by the window. The server was courteous and attentive. Unfortunately  the fare was not as commendable. Aaron ordered the lamb curry    . lunch special; A hot chai tea    . ; and vegetable chaat samosa    .   . vegetable chaat samosa arrived first  a heaping plate of green chutney creamy yogurt  and innumerable other colors and flavors. vegetable chaat samosa was just okay. Try the chaat at Mount Everest down the road to see what real chaat should taste like. A hot chai tea arrived after. A hot chai tea A hot chai tea was so disappointing. It is impossible to find good chai in Las Vegas. Does not taste like Indian chai tea. Next the lamb curry arrived with a heaping scoop of jasmine rice. the lamb curry was bland and unenjoyable. Aaron's friend enjoyed a dear friend's chicken tikka masala and naan. Aaron tried naan and naan was hot and fresh  though a bit thin and crispy. There are too many excellent Indian food options in Las Vegas to return to Samosa Factory.
reviews.name: Aaron

reviews.text: Very friendly service and lovely food. Karen got the garlic naan  lamb curry  okra  and paneer mahkni. Sauces were tasty and all was delicious. The rice pudding with blueberry topping was DIVINE. Karen m lactose intolerant and ate nearly everything Karen. Holy cow. Yeah no kidding  the  best rice pudding in the world. Karen concur. Difficult to locate Samosa Factory if you do not  know where to look. Samosa Factory  in the strip mall directly west of the Panda Express on Sahara. The exterior is not  anything to write home about  but the interior is tastefully decorated and smells wonderful. Karen want more rice pudding !  !
reviews.name: Karen

reviews.text: My go to place for Indian food in Vegas. Samosa Factory  one of those best kept secrets for Indian food for Vegas in my opinion. Samosa Factory a casual ambiance place with great food that is  reasonably priced. Tiffanie always get Samosa Factory's naan bread and paneer. Tiffanie love it here also for Samosa Factory's great vegetarian options ! Love Samosa Factory.
reviews.name: Tiffanie

reviews.text: A friend recommended the restaurant. Do not  let the name fool you. Mykul found the interior upscale. The staff was very friendly  even when Mykul sent the iced tea back. Mykul hate chai tea. Mykul had the butter chicken which was out of this world. For dessert the rice pudding  fantastic. the rice pudding had cinnamon and fresh blueberries on the rice pudding. Mykul's friend had the coconut chicken which Mykul tried also. Hard to choose between the two which Mykul liked more.
